name: Jellyfin Media Server
tagline: Personal streaming over HTTPS via Cloudflare Tunnel.
description: A self-hosted media server running on my laptop. Accessible anywhere with Cloudflare Tunnel. Includes user accounts, libraries, and streaming.

name: Demo Control Panel
tagline: Central UI to manage and launch demos.
description: A lightweight dashboard concept to start, stop, and monitor demo services on demand. This demo focuses on system orchestration and access control.

name: Document Q&A (RAG)
tagline: Ask questions over uploaded documents with citations.
description: A retrieval-augmented generation demo: documents are indexed, relevant chunks are retrieved, and answers are generated with citations. Designed for fast prototyping and controlled evaluation.

name: Route & Schedule Optimizer (OR-Tools)
tagline: Constraint-solving for routing, scheduling, and assignments.
description: A practical operations research demo using Google OR-Tools: solve vehicle routing, job scheduling, and assignment problems with constraints and objective trade-offs.
